a large pipe, usually underground, that is used for carrying waste water and human waste away from buildings to a place where they can be safely got rid of: a sewer pipe A complicated system of sewers runs under the city. open sewer
a channel for carrying away waste water and waste from the human body that is above the ground and is not covered: Next to the filthy alley is what appears to be an open sewer.
